Package breakout.core.screens.views

Class ViewBuilder

java.lang.Object
breakout.core.screens.views.ViewBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
DefaultDependenciesInjectable
public class ViewBuilder extends Object implements DefaultDependenciesInjectable
Builds the static UI view for the application. Building uses syntactic sugar with method chaining.
